newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israeli soldier's death raises Gaza toll to 70.
newsitem.headline: Israeli soldier's death raises Gaza toll to 70.

text.p: An Israeli soldier wounded in fighting with Palestinians in the Gaza Strip last week died on Monday, raising to 70 the number of Arabs and Jews killed in four days of violence, the army said.
The soldier was the 15th Israeli fatality from clashes that erupted after Israel's opening last Tuesday of an archaeological tunnel near Moslem holy places in Jerusalem. Fifty-five Palestinians died.
The army said the 20-year-old soldier was shot near the Jewish settlement of Netzarim in the Gaza Strip on Thursday.
